meanings.sent1: She seemed preoccupied with her own thoughts during the entire class.
meanings.sent2: He was too preoccupied with his worries to notice the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked preoccupied as if pondering the meaning of life.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a preoccupied garden, blooming with endless questions.
meanings.sent5: The preoccupied expression on his face revealed his deep contemplation.

meanings.sent1: The preoccupied schedule left no time for leisure activities.
meanings.sent2: The preoccupied workers rushed around the busy office, completing tasks.
meanings.sent3: The preoccupied bees buzzed around the hive, collecting nectar in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The preoccupied streets were filled with people rushing to their destinations.
meanings.sent5: The preoccupied atmosphere in the room indicated a productive day ahead.
